name: pnp-powerplatform-prompts-career-guidance-topic
title: Career Guidance Topic
shortDescription: This Copilot Studio prompt helps you create a topic for the beginning of a career guidance conversation by prompting for the necessary information from the user.

metadata.value: Let someone evaluate their career, choosing from a list of strengths, and choosing from a list of weaknesses, and then providing their full name, job title, career goals, and any roles they would like to explore. Confirm their input.
